Description.Name: Repaired Mechbay
Description.Details: The first set of cradles turned out alright, Boss. It's really starting to look like a proper DropShip. I can get started on fabricating parts to assemble the final two cradles from scratch. Producing the parts in duplicate should save us a little time and money.

AssignedCastDescription: The cradles can be completed, but Sumire has some concerns. You should talk to her before trying to field a full extra lance, Boss.
